channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Ninja Forms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Ninja Forms

item.title: CVE-2024-7354|2024-09-03T14:01:08.897Z -- unknown -- ninja%20forms
item.description: The Ninja Forms WordPress plugin before 3.8.11 does not escape an URL before outputting it back in an attribute, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin

item.title: CVE-2024-7354|2024-09-02T06:00:01.326Z -- unknown -- ninja%20forms
item.description: The Ninja Forms WordPress plugin before 3.8.11 does not escape an URL before outputting it back in an attribute, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting which could be used against high privilege users such as admin
